properties.entry: Date when the information was collected or extracted from your aid management systems.

Field no. 1 - Data as per date: Enter the year for which data are reported (e.g. if we are in year 2013, you enter 2012 because you report data for 2012). This field is included to keep track of the exact date when the information was collected or extracted from donors' aid management systems

6a. Level of Certainty F1 Provisional actual spending data Actual data for the previous year, but prior to final data validation. F2 Future spending data for existing commitments High certainty of planning data, changes would be due to an activity development that deviates from original planning. F3 Future spending data for concrete measures in preparatory phase Reduced degree of certainty; planned spending is allocated to specific projects but project design and financing commitments are prior to their finalization and approval. F4 Indicative future spending plans (data for measures in proposal phase) Lowest degree of certainty; planned spending is based on a "spending envelopes" for a country/region and/or sector/purpose, little detail available.
